channel.title: Help for rep++
channel.description:
I can't find the right section, so please move it if its wrong and not lock, i really want help.
I want to add the runescape userbars like ''divine member'' to my IPB forums, adding crowns to moderators.
I'm pretty new to ipb so if someone could post a guide/tutorail please, or help me?
For who still dont know what i mean:
[img]http://www.rspscoding.biz/index.php?/user/164-ba%ce%b7%ce%b7%d1%94d/[/img] Savions Sw = Name
[img]http://www.rspscoding.biz/public/style_extra/reputation_icons/TLr6v.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0QZCl.png[/img]
Thanks if anyone could help me.
Regards, Savions Sw

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Hi savions, I see you must have given up on bothering Zealusion.

However, you should be asking for help from the IPB community, I’ll help anyways. Upload the user bars to public/style_extra/yourstyle/team_icons/ then just go to the user group that you wish to have the bar and type in the name of the file. I may have typed that folder directory wrong, but I think it’s right.

If you want to display secondary member groups user bars too, you need a mod. And if you’re wishing to display the “respected” bar, you need to add a mod to show that in the postbit.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I just re-read the thread and may have misunderstood it… if you are asking for someone to create you userbars, it belongs in this section. If you are asking for help adding them, go to the IPB help forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You cannot rep, also IPB has a community forum that you can use for help. This is a rsps community, we help with rsps related questions I should also point out this is the server help section, this section is for rsps server help questions!

THANK YOU!

Read full topic
